item.title: WATCH: Lava flows on Mount Etna on New Year's Day
item.description: A drone captured stunning footage of lava flowing from a fissure on Italy's Mount Etna on New Year's Day.

item.title: Anthony Joshua's driver charged after deadly crash in Nigeria
item.description: Police say the driver in a deadly car crash that injured heavyweight champion Anthony Joshua and killed his two friends in Nigeria has been charged

item.title: FBI says it thwarted potential New Year's terror attack 'directly inspired' by ISIS
item.description: The FBI in Charlotte, North Carolina, said it "thwarted a potential" New Year's Eve terror attack.

item.title: WATCH: Ohio police search for suspect after dentist, wife found murdered at home
item.description: Ohio authorities are searching for a suspect after a dentist and his wife were found murdered inside their home earlier this week.

item.title: Sparklers in champagne bottles may have led to deadly Swiss fire: Investigators
item.description: Investigators probing the deadly New Year's Day fire at a Swiss resort bar are looking into the possibility that it started from sparklers.
